snippet: The lending corporation said that federal regulators would accuse it of overcharging military personnel for interest on student loans.
abstract: Federal Deposit Insurance Corp plans to accuse Sallie Mae, giant student lending corporation, of charging military personnel excessive interest on student loans; government is looking into similar allegations against other lenders.
lead_paragraph: The lending corporation said that federal regulators would accuse it of overcharging military personnel for interest on student loans.

headline.main: Sallie Mae to Be Accused of Overcharging Military Personnel on Loans
headline.print_headline: Loan Rates To Military To Be Cited As Excessive

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
